Game.Name: Cartoon Network Racing
Game.Plot: Cartoon Network Racing combies vehicle racing with the stars from great Cartoon Network shows, for the best in racing action! • Race as 20 Cartoon Network characters - The Powerpuff Girls, Johnny Bravo, Dexter, Cow, Chicken, Courage the Cowardly Dog, I M Weasel and more • Plow into boxes to unlock 16 random power-ups -- from oil spills and smokescreens to chili-pepper speed boosts • Four difficulty levels, with multiple speed and kart power settings • Up to four people can play at once, through a single cartridge
